      • noteOnOffNow

        public void noteOnOffNow(int duration,
                java.lang.String note)
        Single note played, based on methods noteOn and noteOff.
        Parameters:
        duration - duration of the sound (delay between invocation of noteOn and noteOff).
        note - note to be shut down.
